attributes.action: Revoke Criminon and Narconon Scientology front groups charitable status
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Criminon and Narconon arent about rehabilitation, they are recruitment methods of the Sinister and Abusive Scientology Cult. they currently have Charities Commission Tax Free status. The British taxpayer should not be expected to subsidise Cults.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
